system.description:
Effect: The Weather becomes Foggy for the next 3 Rounds.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is Dynamaxed and has a Bug-Type attack on the Active List.
